mutants.original_line: return men + boys
mutants.mutated_line: return men - boys
mutants.code:
def men_from_boys(arr):
    unique_arr = list(set(arr))
    men = [num for num in unique_arr if num % 2 == 0]
    boys = [num for num in unique_arr if num % 2 != 0]
    men.sort()
    boys.sort(reverse=True)
    return men - boys
